document.full_text: former "high school musical" starlet vanessa hudgens is set to play a pregnant, homeless teen "gimme shelter," an indie drama that will also star brendan fraser as her father.
document.title: vanessa hudgens to play fraser's daughter in drama
lines_and_colors: former "high school musical" starlet vanessa hudgens is set to play a pregnant, homeless teen "gimme shelter," an indie drama that will also star brendan fraser as her father.
